name: Chicken Tikka
description: Tender chicken chunks marinated overnight in our house-blend of spices and slow-roasted to perfection in a traditional tandoor. Smoky, juicy, and packed with flavor

name: Paneer Tikka
description: Chunks of fresh paneer marinated in yogurt and spices, skewered and grilled till golden brown

name: Mutton Rogan Josh
description: Slow-cooked mutton in a rich and aromatic Kashmiri-style curry

name: Dal Makhani
description: Creamy black lentils cooked overnight with butter and subtle spices

name: Chicken Biryani
description: Fragrant basmati rice layered with spiced chicken and saffron, served with raita

name: Veg Biryani
description: Basmati rice cooked with garden-fresh vegetables and aromatic spices

name: Butter Chicken
description: Classic North Indian dish of chicken in creamy tomato gravy with butter

name: Malai Kofta
description: Deep-fried paneer balls served in a rich and creamy cashew curry

name: Tandoori Chicken
description: Bone-in chicken marinated with spices and yogurt, grilled in tandoor

name: Spring Rolls
description: Crispy vegetarian spring rolls served with sweet chili sauce

name: Manchurian Dry
description: Crispy veggie balls tossed in a tangy Chinese sauce

name: Chicken Lollipop
description: Fried chicken wings coated in spicy red batter and served with sauce

name: Chole Bhature
description: Spicy chickpeas served with deep-fried fluffy bread

name: Fish Curry
description: Fresh fish simmered in a tangy and spicy Goan-style curry

name: Veg Pulao
description: Aromatic rice cooked with colorful vegetables and whole spices
